attributes.action: ensure Surrey PCT undertakes a full, fair and proper consultation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, supporters of Ashford and St. Peter's Hospitals NHS Trust, call on the Prime Minister to ensure that Surrey PCT undertake a full, fair and proper consultation taking into account the full healthcare needs of residents, 
visitors and workers in Surrey and it's neighbouring counties. We acknowledge that difficult decisions must be taken to ensure that our health services are viable and sustainable for the future but want to be assured that the best interests of all those who rely on Ashford and St. Peter's hospitals and all relevant issues will be considered, giving due weight to the best in evidenced based healthcare.
